RelatedSentence: KIEV , Ukraine - Several hundred people marched in Ukraine 's capital Sunday to commemorate the brutal deportation 70 years ago of Crimea 's entire population of Tatars , while about 20,000 members of the ethnic group rallied in the peninsula 's main city .
